channel.title: PI - Trade doesn't work!
channel.description:
Okay so I started this server and worked out all the kinks, but trade doesn't work! There is no error in the code because I compile fine. I think it has something to do with player rights, but I can't find anything about it. Please help!
-team viewer -skype - joshua.anderson -pm me on here.

item.title: PI - Trade doesn't work!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

It’s probably just that admins can’t trade. A lot of servers have this so that they can’t spawn an item and then give it to a player. I’m not too sure where to change this to be honest. :\

But, I suggest attempting to trade on accounts that do not have spawn rights and see if it works.

Read full topic
